## Running
Start a spark docker container with the following parameters:
```
docker run -it -p 8088:8088 -p 8042:8042 -p 9999:9999 --name sparkC -h spark-sandbox sequenceiq/spark:1.6.0 bash
```
Copy the library created in the compile step to the docker container with:
```
docker cp  sparkC:/tmp
```
On the docker container, run:
```
spark-submit --class Benchmark --packages="com.quantifind:wisp_2.10:0.0.4" --conf spark.driver.memory=2g /tmp/benchmark_2.10-1.0.jar <sites>
```
Where `sites` is an integer representing the number of sites for which TS data should be created
